name: Tesco Lamb Half Shoulder Joint
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Oven><Temperature F="350°F" G="Gas 4" C="180°C" /><Instructions>Remove all packaging.Place in a roasting tray in the centre of a pre-heated oven.Calculate the cooking time at 25 minutes per 500g plus 25 minutes (medium) or 30 minutes per 500g plus 30 minutes (well done).</Instructions></Oven><Microwave><Item23 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave><Barbeque /><Grill /><Shallow_Fry /><Deep_Fry /><Stir_Fry /><Steam /><Poach /><Hob /><Boil_In_The_Bag /><Other_Instructions>Alternatively slow roast for 3 hours until thoroughly cooked and tender.Allow joint to rest in a warm place for 10 minutes before serving.Cooking temperature should read:180°C/ Fan 160°C/ Gas 4</Other_Instructions><Oven_From_Frozen><Temperature F="" G="" C="" /></Oven_From_Frozen><Microwave_From_Frozen><Item24 LineNumber="1" Step="" T650="" T750="" T850="" /></Microwave_From_Frozen><Cooking_Precautions>Adjust times according to your particular oven. All appliances vary these are guidelines only.If cooked rare there is a small risk that harmful bacteria may be present.Tesco recommend that all meat products are cooked thoroughly.Not suitable for microwave cooking.Not suitable for cooking from frozen.</Cooking_Precautions><Preparation_Guidelines>Add to Defrosting section:Once defrosted do not refreeze.Add to Storage section:Suitable for home freezing.Ideally freeze as soon as possible after purchase but always by 'use by' date shown.Use within 1 month. Use by: see front of pack.For more information about our strict welfare and quality standards visit www.tesco.com/realfood</Preparation_Guidelines></Cooking_Instructions><Freezing_Instructions><Defrosting>Defrost thoroughly for a minimum of 24 hours in the refrigerator.Follow the preparation guidelines above.</Defrosting></Freezing_Instructions>
PromotionDescription: Save £2.50 on a Tesco lamb joint Excludes counters & Everyday Value
